sentence.Network_en: Our objective is a free, open and pluralistic society.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的目标是建立一个自由、开放和多元化的社会。

sentence.Network_en: There is movement towards, I think, something in the nature of a pluralistic system.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想，出现了某种向类似多元体系转变的趋势。

sentence.Network_en: Our economy continues to grow, our financial foundation remains solid, our society remains pluralistic , and our politicians continue to debate openly on all the topical issues.
sentence.Network_cn: 香港的经济继续蓬勃增长, 财政基础依然稳固, 社会维持多元化.

entry.def: Pluralistic means the same as pluralist .

example.ex: Our objective is a free, open and pluralistic society.
example.tran: 我们的目标是建立一个自由、开放和多元化的社会。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the philosophical doctrine of pluralism;
